column4: I'm on dual boot with windows and ubuntu,when i try to copy to one of my windows partiton ,it says it cant copy,how do i make it write?
I'm on dual boot with windows and ubuntu,when i try to copy to one of my windows partiton ,it says it cant copy,how do i make it write?
You can`t, you can mount windows partitions read write by editing /etc/fstab
